TopicTitle: How to change your Kerbal's names?

Articles.Content: Can you change your Kerbal's names? If so how can you?

changing the name of a kerbonaught hasn't been impplemented yet the only customizable thing is a patcher or something that allows you to change the eva appearnce of one the kermans, i am not sure how to do it but it is possible to get it i have seen.
You can actually change the names of your Kerbonauts, as well as many settings, by editing the persistence.sfs file in the saves/default folder.

You can actually change the names of your Kerbonauts, as well as many settings, by editing the persistence.sfs file in the saves/default folder.

Thank you much!
I made a video on how to do this very thing, the values are sort of explained in the vid
